item.title: 单位库实现
item.author: bendancom@qq.com (Bendancom)

item.title: 多索引泛型容器类的实现
item.author: bendancom@qq.com (Bendancom)
item.description:
<p><code>C++</code>中实现了单映射<code>STL</code>容器<code>std::map</code>，但实际业务中需要的是多映射类型的对任意数据的快速查找。虽可以使用多个<code>std::map</code>，但这对空间浪费过大，因而作者自行实现一个简易的多索引泛型容器库。</p>
<h2 id="实现思路" class="heading-element"><span>实现思路</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%9e%e7%8e%b0%e6%80%9d%e8%b7%af" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>使用关联容器或自定义关联容器存储索引
使用容器存储数据表，容器类型可根据<code>IO</code>特性自行调整</p>
<ul>
<li>键：数据的引用，以减少重复数据。</li>
<li>值：数据在总表中的位置(指针)。</li>
</ul>
<p>容器是不能存储引用的，使用<code>std::reference_wrapper</code>来包装引用并存储
使用 <code>std::tuple</code> 封装数据。</p>
<h2 id="标准库使用" class="heading-element"><span>标准库使用</span>
 <a href="#%e6%a0%87%e5%87%86%e5%ba%93%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li><code>&lt;type_traits&gt;</code></li>
<li><code>&lt;ranges&gt;</code></li>
<li><code>&lt;tuple&gt;</code></li>
<li><code>&lt;vector&gt;</code></li>
<li><code>&lt;concepts&gt;</code></li>
</ul>
<h2 id="泛型" class="heading-element"><span>泛型</span>
 <a href="#%e6%b3%9b%e5%9e%8b" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="索引类的键值对类型" class="heading-element"><span>索引类的键值对类型</span>
 <a href="#%e7%b4%a2%e5%bc%95%e7%b1%bb%e7%9a%84%e9%94%ae%e5%80%bc%e5%af%b9%e7%b1%bb%e5%9e%8b" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><h4 id="键" class="heading-element"><span>键</span>
 <a href="#%e9%94%ae" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p><code>std::reference_wrapper</code> 的本质是指针，即在内存中占用<code>sizeof(size_t)</code>大小字节，由此可进行分类：</p>
<ul>
<li>$\geqslant$<code>sizeof(size_t)</code>的使用 <code>std::reference_wrapper</code></li>
<li>$<$<code>sizeof(size_t)</code>的使用其本身</li>
</ul>
<p>那么类型别名模板如下：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">T</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">using</span> <span class="n">map_key</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">conditional_t</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">sizeof</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="k">sizeof</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">size_t</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">T</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">reference_wrapper</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="o">&gt;&gt;</span><span class="p">;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="值" class="heading-element"><span>值</span>
 <a href="#%e5%80%bc" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><ul>
<li>泛型容器，其索引值为该泛型容器的迭代器</li>
<li>随机访问容器，其索引值可优化为内存地址</li>
</ul>
<p>为泛型选择了第一种。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">T</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">Args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">container</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">Args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">using</span> <span class="n">map_value</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">ranges</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">iterator_t</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">container</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">tuple</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">Args</span><span class="p">...</span><span class="o">&gt;&gt;&gt;</span><span class="p">;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="索引容器包装解封" class="heading-element"><span>索引容器包装/解封</span>
 <a href="#%e7%b4%a2%e5%bc%95%e5%ae%b9%e5%99%a8%e5%8c%85%e8%a3%85%e8%a7%a3%e5%b0%81" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><h4 id="map_wrapper" class="heading-element"><span><code>map_wrapper</code></span>
 <a href="#map_wrapper" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>对单个索引容器的包装</p>
<h5 id="map_wrapper封装" class="heading-element"><span><code>map_wrapper</code>封装</span>
 <a href="#map_wrapper%e5%b0%81%e8%a3%85" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h5><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">Args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">T</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">struct</span> <span class="nc">map_wrapper</span> <span class="p">{};</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h5 id="map_wrapper_expand" class="heading-element"><span><code>map_wrapper_expand</code></span>
 <a href="#map_wrapper_expand" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h5><p>运用模板特化读取封装的单个索引容器类型，后接两个类型：</p>
<ul>
<li><code>K</code>: 键类型</li>
<li><code>V</code>: 值类型</li>
</ul>
<p>直接组成一个完好的索引类。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">T</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">K</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">V</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">struct</span> <span class="nc">map_wrapper_expand</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">Args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">T</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">Args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">Other</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">K</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">V</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">struct</span> <span class="nc">map_wrapper_expand</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">Other</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">K</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">V</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">using</span> <span class="n">type</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Other</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">K</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">V</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">};</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="maps_wrapper" class="heading-element"><span><code>maps_wrapper</code></span>
 <a href="#maps_wrapper" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>对不同索引的整体封装</p>
<h5 id="maps_wrapper-封装" class="heading-element"><span><code>maps_wrapper</code> 封装</span>
 <a href="#maps_wrapper-%e5%b0%81%e8%a3%85" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h5><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">export</span> <span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">Args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">Others</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">struct</span> <span class="nc">maps_wrapper</span> <span class="p">{};</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h5 id="maps_wrapper_expand" class="heading-element"><span><code>maps_wrapper_expand</code></span>
 <a href="#maps_wrapper_expand" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h5><p>通过对 <code>maps_wrapper</code>的展开，对其中的每个索引容器单独使用 <code>map_wrapper</code> 封装，后组合成 <code>std::tuple</code> 的二层封装结构</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">template</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">T</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">struct</span> <span class="nc">maps_wrapper_expand</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">template</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">template</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">template</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">Args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">T</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">template</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">Args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span><span class="n">Others</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">struct</span> <span class="nc">maps_wrapper_expand</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">Others</span><span class="p">...</span><span class="o">&gt;&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">using</span> <span class="n">type</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">tuple</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">map_wrapper</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">Others</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">...</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">};</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h5 id="踩坑" class="heading-element"><span>踩坑</span>
 <a href="#%e8%b8%a9%e5%9d%91" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h5><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">template</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">T</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">struct</span> <span class="nc">maps_wrapper_expand</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">template</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">template</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">template</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">Args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">T</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">template</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">Args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span><span class="n">Others</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">struct</span> <span class="nc">maps_wrapper_expand</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">Others</span><span class="p">...</span><span class="o">&gt;&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">template</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">V</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">K</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">using</span> <span class="n">type</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">tuple</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">Others</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">K</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">V</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">...</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">};</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>这个方法看起来可以直接一步到位，只要如下使用即可：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">maps_wrapper_expand</span><span class="o">&lt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">maps_wrapper</span><span class="o">&lt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">map</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">map</span><span class="o">&gt;&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">type</span><span class="o">&lt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">long</span> <span class="kt">double</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="n">maps</span><span class="p">;</span> 
</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>以上确实能通过编译。</p>
<p>但在引入模板后，不能通过编译。
模板如下：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">template</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">Maps</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">V</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">K</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">using</span> <span class="n">maps_tuple_t</span> <span class="o">=</span><span class="n">maps_wrapper_expand</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">Maps</span><span class="o">&gt;::</span><span class="n">type</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">V</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">K</span><span class="p">...</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">;</span> 
</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>探查下来问题大概出在可变参数模板类内的类型别名模板定义，不能在可变参数模板类中嵌套类型别名模板。</p>
<h4 id="maps_tuple_before" class="heading-element"><span><code>maps_tuple_before</code></span>
 <a href="#maps_tuple_before" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>原理是将两种可变参数分别按顺序封装到 <code>std::tuple</code> 中，再利用 <code>size_t... N</code> 统一进行展开并拼装为完整的索引类，最后封装至<code>std::tuple</code>中。
使用<code>map_wrapper_expand</code>来进行拼装</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">T</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">K</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">V</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">Index</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">struct</span> <span class="nc">maps_tuple_before</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">T</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">K</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">V</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size_t</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">N</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">struct</span> <span class="nc">maps_tuple_before</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">K</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">V</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">index_sequence</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">N</span><span class="p">...</span><span class="o">&gt;&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">using</span> <span class="n">type</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">tuple</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">map_wrapper_expand</span><span class="o">&lt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">tuple_element_t</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">N</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">maps_wrapper_expand</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="o">&gt;::</span><span class="n">type</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">tuple_element_t</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">N</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">K</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">V</span><span class="o">&gt;::</span><span class="n">type</span><span class="p">...</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">};</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="maps_tuple" class="heading-element"><span><code>maps_tuple</code></span>
 <a href="#maps_tuple" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>这就是最终的对索引容器处理的类，是对<code>maps_tuple_before</code>进行一个模板简化。
在其上增添了自动生成 <code>std::index_sequence&lt;N...&gt;</code></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">T</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">container_args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">container</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">typename</span> <span class="n">associative_containers</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">typename</span><span class="p">...</span> <span class="n">args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">struct</span> <span class="nc">maps_tuple</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">using</span> <span class="n">type</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">maps_tuple_before</span><span class="o">&lt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">associative_containers</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">tuple</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">map_key</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">args</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">...</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">map_value</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">container</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">args</span><span class="p">...</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">make_index_sequence</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">sizeof</span><span class="p">...(</span><span class="n">args</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">&gt;&gt;::</span><span class="n">type</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">};</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>

</div><h3 id="multi_index" class="heading-element"><span><code>multi_index</code></span>
 <a href="#multi_index" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>使用约束与模板进行泛型匹配
应有如下类型</p>
<ul>
<li>数据容器</li>
<li>索引容器包装，其中含有各数据所需索引容器类型</li>
<li>数据</li>
</ul>
<h4 id="模板" class="heading-element"><span>模板</span>

</div><h4 id="约束" class="heading-element"><span>约束</span>
 <a href="#%e7%ba%a6%e6%9d%9f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>由于泛型的需求，其<code>requires</code>要求应为最普适，即：</p>
<ul>
<li>数据表容器应为 <code>common_range</code>&amp;<code>sized_range</code>类型</li>
<li>数据量应与索引容器量一致</li>
<li>索引表容器应为 <code>common_range</code>类型，并可被<code>std::get</code>函数解包，且有如下函数：
<ul>
<li><code>find</code></li>
<li><code>insert</code></li>
<li><code>erase</code></li>
<li><code>count</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p>而索引总类是由 <code>std::tuple</code>进行包装的，因而须函数展开进行约束计算。</p>

<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">constexpr</span> <span class="n">iterator</span> <span class="nf">erase</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">const</span> <span class="n">iterator</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">iter</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">requires</span> <span class="k">requires</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_sheet_t</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">iterator</span> <span class="n">iter</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">erase</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">iter</span><span class="p">);</span> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">erase_indexs</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">iter</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">make_index_sequence</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">sizeof</span><span class="p">...(</span><span class="n">args</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">{});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">data_sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">erase</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">iter</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">constexpr</span> <span class="kt">void</span> <span class="nf">pop_back</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">requires</span> <span class="k">requires</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_sheet_t</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">pop_back</span><span class="p">();</span> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">erase_indexs</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">end</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">--</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">make_index_sequence</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">sizeof</span><span class="p">...(</span><span class="n">args</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">{});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">data_sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">pop_back</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">constexpr</span> <span class="kt">void</span> <span class="nf">clear</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">requires</span> <span class="k">requires</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_sheet_t</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">maps_tuple_t</span> <span class="n">maps</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">clear</span><span class="p">();</span> <span class="n">maps</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">clear</span><span class="p">();</span> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">data_sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">clear</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">clear_indexs</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">make_index_sequence</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">sizeof</span><span class="p">...(</span><span class="n">args</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">{});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">constexpr</span> <span class="kt">void</span> <span class="nf">pop_front</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">requires</span> <span class="k">requires</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_sheet_t</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">pop_front</span><span class="p">();</span> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">erase_indexs</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">begin</span><span class="p">(),</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">make_index_sequence</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="k">sizeof</span><span class="p">...(</span><span class="n">args</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">{});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">data_sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">pop_front</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>

<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">template</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">size_t</span> <span class="n">N</span><span class="o">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">constexpr</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">vector</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">iterator</span><span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="n">find</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">const</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">tuple_element_t</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">N</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">data_list_t</span><span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">vector</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">iterator</span><span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="n">tmp</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">auto</span> <span class="n">iter</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">N</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">map</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="n">find</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">iter</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">N</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">map</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="n">end</span><span class="p">())</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">size_t</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">N</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">map</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="n">count</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">iter</span><span class="p">));</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="o">++</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">tmp</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">push_back</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">std</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">*++</span><span class="n">iter</span><span class="p">));</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">tmp</span><span class="p">;</span>
